remarks: Weak version of ~ sp .  Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes.  Lemma 9 of [KalishMontague] p. 87.  This may be the best we can do with minimal distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2017.)
statement:
spfw.1 $e |- ( -. ps -> A. x -. ps ) $.
spfw.2 $e |- ( A. x ph -> A. y A. x ph ) $.
spfw.3 $e |- ( -. ph -> A. y -. ph ) $.
spfw.4 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
spfw $p |- ( A. x ph -> ph ) $.
$d x y $.
